# Insert Screen of Clones {#sec-molecular-clone_insert_screen}

## Introduction

-   **Purpose**: This procedure describes how to do a insert screen of clones using PCR.
-   **Procedure Type**: xxx
-   **Species**:
    -   Threespine stickleback, (*Gasterosteus aculeatus*)
    -   Bay pipefish, (*Syngnathus leptorhyncus*)
    -   Gulf pipefish (*Syngnathus scovelli*)
    -   Zebrafish, (*Danio rerio*)
-   **Author**: xxx
-   **Date Created**: xxx

::: {.callout-warning title="NOTES"}
xxxx
:::

## Materials

1.  10 ul 2X Turbo
2.  0.1 ul T7
3.  0.1 ul M13R
4.  0.1 ul Taq
5.  7.7 ul npH20

## Procedure

-   94-5min
-   94-1:15
-   55-1:15
-   72-2:30
-   cycle 2 for 36x
-   72-10min
